properties.entry: SELECT sar.*, (SELECT NAME FROM sc_amazon_account WHERE id=sar.account_id) AS ACCOUNT_NAME, srp.NAME AS REAL_NAME, srp.REAL_SKU, srp.ID AS REAL_ID, srp.IMAGE_URL FROM sc_amazon_recommendations sar LEFT JOIN sc_real_product_rel srpr ON sar.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND sar.SKU = srpr.SKU LEFT JOIN sc_real_product srp ON srpr.REAL_ID = srp.ID WHERE 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}

SELECT sar.*, (SELECT NAME FROM sc_amazon_account WHERE id=sar.account_id) AS ACCOUNT_NAME, srp.NAME AS REAL_NAME, srp.REAL_SKU, srp.ID AS REAL_ID, srp.IMAGE_URL FROM sc_amazon_recommendations_pricing sar LEFT JOIN sc_real_product_rel srpr ON sar.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND sar.SKU = srpr.SKU LEFT JOIN sc_real_product srp ON srpr.REAL_ID = srp.ID WHERE 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}

SELECT sar.*, (SELECT NAME FROM sc_amazon_account WHERE id=sar.account_id) AS ACCOUNT_NAME, srp.NAME AS REAL_NAME, srp.REAL_SKU, srp.ID AS REAL_ID, srp.IMAGE_URL FROM sc_amazon_recommendations_fulfillment sar LEFT JOIN sc_real_product_rel srpr ON sar.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND sar.SKU = srpr.SKU LEFT JOIN sc_real_product srp ON srpr.REAL_ID = srp.ID WHERE 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}

SELECT sar.*, (SELECT NAME FROM sc_amazon_account WHERE id=sar.account_id) AS ACCOUNT_NAME, srp.NAME AS REAL_NAME, srp.REAL_SKU, srp.ID AS REAL_ID, srp.IMAGE_URL FROM sc_amazon_recommendations_listing_quality sar LEFT JOIN sc_real_product_rel srpr ON sar.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND sar.SKU = srpr.SKU LEFT JOIN sc_real_product srp ON srpr.REAL_ID = srp.ID WHERE 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}
select sar.*, (select name from sc_amazon_account where id=sar.account_id) as ACCOUNT_NAME from sc_amazon_recommendations_selection sar where 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}
